SA10nagvigvu:2: NagVv_1 sarveṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ sarvatra na vidyate svabhāvaś cet /
SA10nagvigvu:3: tvadvacanam asvabhāvaṃ na nivartayitum svabhāvam alaṃ //
SA10nagvigvu:4: yadi sarveṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ hetau pratyayeṣu ca hetupratyayasāmagrāñ ca pṛthak ca yatra sarvatra svabhāvo na vidyata iti kṛtvā śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti /
SA10nagvigvu:7: na pratyayeṣu samagreṣu na hetupratyayeṣu samagreṣu na hetupratyayasāmagrāṃ na hetupratyayavinirmuktaḥ pṛthag eva vā /
SA10nagvigvu:8: yasmād atra svabhāvo nāsti tasmān niḥsvabhāvo 'ṅkuraḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:10: yathā cāyam aṅkuro niḥsvabhāvo niḥsvabhāvāc ca śūnyaḥ tathā sarvabhāvā niḥsvabhāvatvāc chūnya iti /
SA10nagvigvu:13: yady evaṃ tavāpi vacanaṃ yady etac chūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti tad api śūnyaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:14: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ tad api hetau nāsti /
SA10nagvigvu:15: mahābhūteṣu saṃprayukteṣu viprayukteṣu vā pratyayeṣu nāsti /
SA10nagvigvu:26: nāsatībhir atbhiḥ śakyaṃ kledayitum evam asattā vacanena śakyaḥ sarvabhāvasvabhāvapratiṣedhaḥ kartuṃ na śakyaḥ sarvabhāvasvabhāvo nivartayituṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:27: tatra yad uktaṃ sarvabhāvasvabhāvaḥ pratiṣidhaḥ sarvatra bhāvasvabhāvo vinivartata iti / tan na //
SA10nagvigvu:29: NagVv_2 atha sasvabhāvam etad vākyaṃ pūrvā hata pratijñā te /
SA10nagvigvu:31: athāpi manyase mā bhūd eṣa doṣa iti sasvabhāvam etad vākyaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:33: tasmād anena sarvabhāvasvabhāvaḥ pratiṣiddhaḥ sarvabhāvasvabhāvo vinivarta iti //
SA10nagvigvu:35: yā hi te pratijñā śūnyāḥ svabhāvā iti /
SA10nagvigvu:38: kasmāt sarvabhāveṣu tvadvacanam aśūnyaṃ yenāśūnyatvāt sarvabhāvasvabhāvaḥ pratiṣiddhaḥ //
SA10nagvigvu:41: hanta cet punaḥ śūnyāḥ sarvahhāvās tena tvadvacanaṃ śūnyam sarvabhāvāntargatatvāt tvadvacanasya /
SA10nagvigvu:43: tatra yaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ śūnyāḥ sarvabhāva iti anupapannaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:45: upapannaś cet punaḥ śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti pratiṣedhas tena tvadvacanaśūnyatvād anena pratiṣedho anupapannaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:47: atha śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvās tvadvacanañ cāśūnyaḥ yena pratiṣedhas tena tvadvacanaṃ sarvatrāsaṃgṛhītaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:50: sarvatra cet punaḥ gṛhītaṃ tvadvacanaṃ sarvabhāvāś ca śūnyāḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:51: tena tad api śūnyaṃ śūnyatvād anena nāsti pratiṣedhaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:53: atha śūnyam asti vānena pratiṣedhaḥ śūnyaḥ sarvabhāvā iti tena śūnyāpi sarvabhāvāḥ kāryakriyāsamarthā samarthabhaveyuḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:56: atha śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvāḥ na ca kāryaṃ kriyāsamarthaṃ bhavaṃti mā bhūt dṛṣṭāntavirodha iti kṛtvā śūnyena tvadvacanena sarvabhāvāsvabhāvo pratiṣedho nopapanna iti / 6 /
SA10nagvigvu:61: yena hi viśeṣahetunā kiñcit śūnyaṃ kiñcid aśūnyaṃ syāt /
SA10nagvigvu:63: tatra yad uktaṃ śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti tan na //
SA10nagvigvu:66: NagVv_3 mā śabdavad ity etat syāt te buddhir na caitad upapannam /
SA10nagvigvu:68: syāt te buddhiḥ yathā nāma kaścit brūyāt mā śabdaṃ kārṣīr mā śabdaṃ kārṣīr iti /
SA10nagvigvu:71: śūnyena vacanena sarvatā sarvabhāvasvabhāvavyāvartanaṃ kriyata iti /
SA10nagvigvu:74: satā hy atra śabdena hy atra bhaviṣyataḥ śabdasya pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate /
SA10nagvigvu:75: na punar iha bhavataḥ satā vacanena sarvabhāvasvabhāvapratiṣedhaḥ kriyate /
SA10nagvigvu:76: tava hi matena vacanam apy asat /
SA10nagvigvu:78: tasmād ayaṃ mā śabdavad iti viṣayopanyāso 'sann iti //
SA10nagvigvu:81: NagVv_4 pratipratiṣedhyo 'py evam iti mataṃ bhavet tad asad eva /
SA10nagvigvu:82: evaṃ tava pratijña lakṣaṇato dūṣyate na mama //
SA10nagvigvu:83: syāt te buddhiḥ pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyo 'py anenaiva kalpenānupapannaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:88: kasmāt tava ca hi pratijñālakṣaṇaprāptam etan na mama bhavān iha bravīti /
SA10nagvigvu:92: tatra yad uktaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyo 'py evaṃ matam iti /
SA10nagvigvu:96: NagVv_5 pratyakṣeṇa hi tāvad yady upalabhya vinivartayasi bhāvān /
SA10nagvigvu:98: yadi pratyakṣataḥ sarvabhāvān upalabhya bhavān nivartayati śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti /
SA10nagvigvu:100: kasmāt pratyakṣam api hi pramāṇaṃ svabhāvāntargatatvāt śūnyaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:101: yo 'pi sarvabhāvān upalabhate so 'pi śūnyas tasmāt pratyakṣeṇa pramāṇena nopalambhabhāvo anupalabdhasya ca pratiṣedhānupapattiḥ śūnyaḥ sarvabhāvā iti / tad anupapannaṃ
SA10nagvigvu:104: anumānenāgamenopānena vā sarvabhāvān upalabhya sarvabhāvavyāvartanaṃ kriyata iti //
SA10nagvigvu:108: anumānam apy upamānāgamāś ca pratyakṣeṇa pramāṇena pratyuktāḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:109: yathā hi pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ śūnyaṃ sarvabhāvānāṃ śūnyatvāt /
SA10nagvigvu:113: te 'pi śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvānāṃ śūnyatvāt* anumānopamānāgamaiś ca yo 'pi bhāvān upalabhate so 'pi śūnyaḥ tasmāt bbāvānām upalambhābhāvo 'nupalabdhānāñ ca svabhāvapratiṣedhānupapattiḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:114: tatra yad uktaṃ śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti / tan na //
SA10nagvigvu:117: NagVv_7 kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmāvasthavidaś ca manyante /
SA10nagvigvu:118: kuśalaṃ janasvabhāvaṃ śeṣeṣv apy eṣa viniyogaḥ //
SA10nagvigvu:119: iha dharmāvasthāvido manyante kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām ekonaviṃśaṃ śataṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:122: sparśasya manasikārasya chandasyādhimokṣasya vīryasya smṛteḥ samādheḥ prajñāyā upekṣāyāḥ prayogasya saṃprayogasya prāpto 'dhyāśayasya prativirateḥ vyavasāyā autsukyasya /
SA10nagvigvu:123: unmūrdhe utsāhasya avyārtyasya vasitāyāḥ pratipatter avipratīsārasya dhṛter adhyavasāyasya /
SA10nagvigvu:130: prekṣupratikūlasya pradakṣiṇagrāhasya vaiśāradyagauravasya citrīkārasya [Vv_234] bhakter abhakteḥ suśrūṣāyāḥ sādarasyānādarasya prasrabdheḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:131: hāsasya vācaḥ viṣpandanāyāḥ siddhasyāprasādasya aprasrabdheḥ vyavahāratāyaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:134: apradakṣiṇagrāhasya saṃepasya saṃvarāṇāṃ pariśuddher adhyāśayasya rūpasyeti /
SA10nagvigvu:137: amada alobha adoṣa amoha asarvat* apratiniḥsargaḥ vibhava apatrayā apariśucchadanaṃ mānanaṃ kāruṇyaṃ maitrī adīnatādaritamari.(d)
SA10nagvigvu:138: ha + + nupanāhaḥ alī cetaso paryādānaṃ kṣāntiḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:142: nairyāṇikatāsarvajñatāsaṃskṛtā dharmāḥ ity ekonaviṃśaṃ śataṃ kuśalānāṃ kuśalaḥ svabhāvaḥ //
SA10nagvigvu:160: niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvāḥ niḥsvabhāvatvāt śūnya iti tan na /
SA10nagvigvu:163: NagVv_8 nairyāṇikasvabhāvo dharmo nairyāṇikāś ca ye teṣāṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:165: iha ca dharmo 'vasthoktānāṃ nairyāṇikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇikaḥ svabhāvaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:171: evaṃ śeṣāṇāṃ tad yasmād evam anekaprakāro dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo dṛṣṭaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:175: NagVv_9 yadi ca na bhavet svabhāvo dharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāva ity evaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:176: nāmāpi bhavet naivaṃ nāmāpi nirvastukan nāsti //
SA10nagvigvu:177: yadi ca dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo bhāvānāṃ svabhāvānāṃ sadbhāvāc cāśūnyaḥ sarvabhāvāḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:178: tatra yad uktaṃ niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvā niḥsvabhāvatvāt śūnyā iti tan na //
SA10nagvigvu:181: NagVv_10 atha vidyate svabhāvaḥ sa ca dharmāṇāṃ na vidyate tasmāt /
SA10nagvigvu:182: dharmair vinā svabhāvaḥ sa yasyāsti tad yuktam upadeṣṭum //
SA10nagvigvu:183: atha manyase mā bhūd avastukaṃ nāmeti kṛtvāsti svabhāvaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:185: evaṃ dharmaśūnyatā ca niḥsvabhāvatvād dharmāṇāṃ siddhā bhaviṣyati /
SA10nagvigvu:188: evaṃ kasyedānīṃ sa svabhāvo dharmavinirmuktasyārthasya tad yuktam upadeṣṭum arthaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:189: sa ca nopadiṣṭas tasmād yā kalpanāsti svabhāvo na punar dharmāṇām iti sā hīnā //
SA10nagvigvu:191: NagVv_11 sata eva pratiṣedho nāsti ghaṭo geha ity ayaṃ yasmāt /
SA10nagvigvu:192: dṛṣṭaḥ pratiṣedho yaṃ sataḥ svabhāvasya te tasmāt //
SA10nagvigvu:193: iha ca sato 'rthasya pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate nāmataḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:197: evam eva nasti svabhāvo dharmāṇām iti /
SA10nagvigvu:200: niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvāḥ niḥsvabhāvatvāt śūnyā iti tan na //
SA10nagvigvu:203: NagVv_12 atha nāsti sa svabhāvaḥ kin na pratiṣidhyate tvayānena /
SA10nagvigvu:204: vacanena rte vacanāt pratiṣedhaḥ sidhyate hy asataḥ //
SA10nagvigvu:205: nāsty eva svabhāvā ity anena vacanena niḥsvabhāvā bhāvā iti kiṃ bhavatā pratiṣidhyate /
SA10nagvigvu:206: asato hi vacād vinā siddhaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:209: NagVv_13 bālānām iva mithyā mṛgatṛṣṇāyāṃ yathājalagrāhaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:210: evaṃ mithyāḥ grāhaḥ syāt te pratiṣidhyate hy asataḥ //
SA10nagvigvu:211: syāt te buddhiḥ yathā bālānāṃ mṛgatṛṣṇāyāṃ mithyājalam iti grāho bhavati /
SA10nagvigvu:212: nanu nirjalā sā mṛgatṛṣṇeti tatra paṇḍitajātīyena puruṣeṇocyate /
SA10nagvigvu:213: tasya mithyāgrāhasya vinivartanārtham evan niḥsvabhāveṣu yaḥ svabhāvo grāhaḥ satvānāṃ tasya vyāvartanārthan niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvā ity ucyata iti //
SA10nagvigvu:216: NagVv_14 nanv evaṃ saty asti grāho grāhyañ ca tadgrahītā ca /
SA10nagvigvu:217: pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyaṃ pratiṣedhā ceti ṣaṭkaṃ tat //
SA10nagvigvu:218: yady evaṃ nanv evaṃ saty asti tāvat satvānāṃ mithyāgrāhaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:220: asti pratiṣedhaḥ tasyāpi mithyāgrāhasyāsti pratiṣedhyaṃ yad idaṃ mithyāgrāhyaṃ nāma /
SA10nagvigvu:221: santi pratiṣedhāro yuṣmadādayo 'sya mithyāgrāhasyeti siddhaṃ ṣaṭkam /
SA10nagvigvu:223: yad uktaṃ śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti tan na //
SA10nagvigvu:224: NagVv_15 atha naivāsti grāho na ca grāhyaṃ na ca grahītāraḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:225: pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyaṃ pratiṣedhāro 'py ata na santi //
SA10nagvigvu:226: atha mā bhūd eṣa doṣa iti kṛtvā naiva grāho 'sti naiva grāhyaṃ na ca grahītāra iti /
SA10nagvigvu:227: evaṃ sati yo 'sau grāhasya pratiṣedhaḥ niḥsvahhāvāḥ sarvabhāvā iti /
SA10nagvigvu:228: so 'pi nāsti pratiṣedhyam api nāsti pratiṣedhāro 'pi na santi /
SA10nagvigvu:230: NagVv_16 pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyaṃ pratiṣedhārāaś ca yady uta na santi /
SA10nagvigvu:231: siddhā hi sarvabhāvā yeṣām evaṃ svabhāvaś ca //
SA10nagvigvu:232: yadi ca na pratiṣedho na pratiṣedhyaṃ na pratiṣeddhāraḥ santy apratisiddhāḥ sarvabhāvā asti ca sarvabhāvānāṃ svabhāvaḥ //
SA10nagvigvu:234: NagVv_17 hetoḥ svato na siddhiḥ naiḥsvābhāvyāt kuto hi te hetuḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:236: niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvā ity etasmin arthe te hetor asiddhiḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:237: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ niḥsvabhāvatvād dhi sarvabhāvānāṃ śūnyatvān na tato hetuḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:238: asati hetau nirhetukasyārthasya śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti kuta eva prasiddhiḥ //
SA10nagvigvu:239: tatra yad uktaṃ śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti tan na //
SA10nagvigvu:241: NagVv_18 yadi cāhetoḥ siddhiḥ svabhāvavinivartanasya te bhavati /
SA10nagvigvu:243: atha manyase nairhetukī siddhiḥ niḥsvabhāvatvasya bhāvānām iti /
SA10nagvigvu:247: NagVv_19 atha hetor astitvaṃ bhāvānaiḥsvābhāvyam ity anupapannam /
SA10nagvigvu:248: loko naiḥsvabhāvyān na hi kaścana vidyate bhāvaḥ //
SA10nagvigvu:252: na hi loke niḥsvabhāvaḥ kaścid bhāvo 'sti //
SA10nagvigvu:254: NagVv_20 pūrvaṃ cet pratiṣedhaḥ paścāt pratiṣedhyam iti na copapannam /
SA10nagvigvu:255: yaś cānupapanno yugapac ca yataḥ svabhāvo 'san //
SA10nagvigvu:256: iha pūrvaṃ cet pratiṣedhaḥ paścāc ca pratiṣedhyaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:259: atha paścāt pratiṣedhaḥ pūrvaṃ pratiṣedhyam iti ca nopapannaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:260: siddhe hi pratiṣedhye kiṃ pratiṣedhaḥ karoti /
SA10nagvigvu:261: atha yugapatpratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhye tathāpi na pratiṣedhyaḥ pratiṣedhyasyārthasya kāraṇaṃ prati na pratiṣedhyaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:263: yathā yugapadutpannayor goviṣāṇayoḥ naiva dakṣiṇaṃ savyasya kāraṇaṃ savyaṃ vā dakṣiṇasya gāraṇaṃ bhavatīti /
SA10nagvigvu:264: tatra yad uktaṃ niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvā iti tan na /
SA10nagvigvu:267: sarveṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ sarvatra na vidyate svabhāvaś cet /
SA10nagvigvu:268: tvadvacanam asvabhāvaṃ na nivartayituṃ svabhāvam alam iti / [1]
SA10nagvigvu:270: NagVv_21 hetupratyayasāmagrāṃ pṛthagbhāve 'pi madvaco na yadi /
SA10nagvigvu:272: yadi madvaco hetau nāsti mahābhūteṣu saṃprayukteṣu viprayukteṣu vā pratyayeṣu nāsti /
SA10nagvigvu:273: uraḥkaṇthojihvādantatālunāsikamūrdhaprabhṛtiṣu ya + + sāmagryām asti heṃpratyayasāmagrīṃ vinirmuktaṃ pṛthag vāsti /
SA10nagvigvu:276: nanu śūnyatvaṃ siddhaṃ niḥsvabhāvatvād asya madīyavacasaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:279: yad bhavatoktaṃ tvadīyavacasaḥ śūnyatvāt śūnyatā sarvabhāvānāṃ nopapadyata iti tan na //
SA10nagvigvu:282: NagVv_22 yaś ca pratītya bhāvānāṃ śūnyateti taṃ brū + + /
SA10nagvigvu:283: yas tu pratītyabhāvo bhavati hi tasyāsvabhāvatvaṃ //
SA10nagvigvu:284_0: śūnyatārthañ ca bhavān bhāvānām anavasamya śūnyatārtham ajñātvā pravṛtti upālambhaṃ
SA10nagvigvu:284_1: vaktuṃ tvadvacanasya śūnyatvāt tvadvacanasya niḥsvabhāvatvād evaṃ tvadvacanena niḥsvabhāvena
SA10nagvigvu:285: iha hi yaḥ pratītya bhavānāṃ bhāvaḥ sā śūnyatā /
SA10nagvigvu:287: ye hi pratītyasamutpānnā bhāvās te sa sasvabhāvā bhavanti /
SA10nagvigvu:293: tasmān niḥsvabhāvāḥ niḥsvabhāvatvāc chūnyā ity abhidhīyante /
SA10nagvigvu:295: pratītyasamutpannatvān niḥsvabhāvaṃ niḥsvabhāvatvāt śūnyam ity upapannaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:298: rathapaṭaghaṭādayaḥ sveṣu sveṣu kāryeṣu kāṣṭhāhaṇamṛttikaharaṇamadhūdakapayasāṃ dhāraṇā śītavātātapaparitrāṇaprabhṛtiṣu vartante /
SA10nagvigvu:299: evam idaṃ madīyavacanaṃ pratyayasamutpannatvān niḥsvabhāvaṃ niḥsvabhāvatvaprasādhanaṃ pratyayabhāvānāṃ vartate /
SA10nagvigvu:301: niḥsvabhavatvāt tvadīyavacanasya śūnyatvaṃ śūnyatvāt tasya ca tena sarvabhāvasvabhāvapratiṣedha upapannam iti tan na //
SA10nagvigvu:304: NagVv_23 nirmitako nirmitakaṃ māyāpuruṣa svamāyayā sṛṣṭam /
SA10nagvigvu:305: pratiṣedhayati yadvat pratiṣedho yaṃ tathaiva syāt //
SA10nagvigvu:306: yathā nirmitakaḥ puruṣam abhyāpataṃ tu kaścid arthena vartamānaṃ pratiṣedhayet /
SA10nagvigvu:307: māyākāreṇa vā sṛṣṭo māyāpurnṣo 'nyaṃ māyāpuruṣa samabhyava tan na kasminścid arthe vartamānaṃ pratiṣedhayet /
SA10nagvigvu:308: tatra yo nirmitakaḥ puruṣaḥ pratiṣedhyate sa śūnyaḥ yaḥ pratiṣedhayati so 'pi māyāpuruṣaḥ śūnya evam eva madvacanena śūnyena sarvabhāvānāṃ svabhāvapratiṣedha upapannaḥ //
SA10nagvigvu:310: śūnyatvāt tvadvacanasya sarvabhāvasvabhāvapratiṣedho nopapannam iti na tan na /
SA10nagvigvu:311: ṣaṭkoṭiko vāda uktaḥ sa evaṃ pratisiddhaḥ naiva hy evaṃ sati na sarvabhāvāntargataṃ madvacanaṃ nāpy aśūnyaṃ nāpi sarvabhāvāśūnyāḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:314: atha sasvabhāvam etad vākyaṃ pūrvā hatā pratijñā te
SA10nagvigvu:315: vaiṣamikatvaṃ tasmin viśeṣahetuś ca vaktavya ity [2]
SA10nagvigvu:317: NagVv_24 na svābhāvikam etad vākyaṃ tasmān na vādahānir me /
SA10nagvigvu:318: nāsti ca vaiṣamikatvaṃ viśesahetuś ca na nigadyaḥ //
SA10nagvigvu:319: na tāvad etan mama vacanaṃ pratītyasamutpannatvāt svabhāvopapannaṃ yathā pūrvam uktaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:321: yasmāc ca idam api madvacanaṃ śūnyaṃ śeṣāpi sarvabhāvāḥ śūnyās tasmān nāsti vaiṣamikatvaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:323: idaṃ vacanam aśūnyaṃ śeṣāḥ sarvabhāvāḥ śūnyā iti tato vaiṣamikatvaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:324: syān na caitad evaṃ tasmān na vaiṣamikatvaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:325: yasmāc ca vaiṣamikatvaṃ na saṃbhavati idaṃ vacanam aśūnyaṃ śeṣāḥ punaḥ sarvabhāvāḥ śūnyā iti /
SA10nagvigvu:326: tasmād asmābhir viśeṣahetur api na vaktavyaḥ anena idaṃ vacanaṃ aśūnyaṃ sarvabhāvāḥ punaḥ śūnyā iti /
SA10nagvigvu:327: tatra yad bhavatoktaṃ vādahānis te vaiṣamikatvaṃ ca viśeṣahetuś ca tvayā vaktavya iti tan na /
SA10nagvigvu:330: mā śabdavad ity etad asmāt te buddhir na caitad upapannaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:331: śabdena hy atra satā bhaviṣyato vāraṇaṃ tasyeti / [3]
SA10nagvigvu:333: NagVv_25 mā śabdavad iti nāyaṃ dṛṣṭānto yas tvayā mamārahdhaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:334: śabdena hi tac ca śabdasya vāraṇaṃ naidam eva caḥ //
SA10nagvigvu:336: yathā kaścin mā śabdaṃ karṣīr iti bruvaṃ śabdam eva karoti śabdañ ca pratiṣedhayati /
SA10nagvigvu:339: atra hi dṛṣṭānte śabdena śabdasya vyāvartanaṃ kriyate /
SA10nagvigvu:341: niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvāḥ niḥsvabhāvatvāt tad aśūnyām iti /
SA10nagvigvu:344: NagVv_26 naiḥsvabhāvyānāṃ cen naiḥsvābhāvyena vāraṇaṃ yadi hi /
SA10nagvigvu:346: yathā mā śabdam iti śabdena śabdasya vyāvartanaṃ kriyate /
SA10nagvigvu:347: evaṃ yadi naiḥsvabhāvyena vacanena naiḥsvabhāvyānāṃ vyāvartanaṃ kriyate tato 'yaṃ dṛṣṭāntopapannaḥ syāt /
SA10nagvigvu:348: iha tu naiḥsvabhāvyena vacanena bhāvānāṃ svabhāvapratiṣedhaḥ kriyate /
SA10nagvigvu:349: evaṃ yadi naiḥsvabhāvyena vacanena niḥsvabhāvānāṃ naiḥsvabhāvyapratiṣedhaḥ kriyate /
SA10nagvigvu:352: śūnyatāñ ca vayaṃ bhāvānām ācakṣmahe nāśūnyatām ity adṛṣṭānta evāyam iti /
SA10nagvigvu:354: NagVv_27 atha vā nirmitakāyāṃ yathā striyāṃ striyam ity asatgrāham /
SA10nagvigvu:355: nirmitakaḥ pratihanyāt kasyacid evaṃ bhaved ettata //
SA10nagvigvu:356: atha vā kasyacit puruṣasya nirmitakāyāṃ striyāṃ svabhāvaśūnyāyāṃ paramārthataḥ striyam ity asadgrāhaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:357: syād eva tasyāṃ tenāsadgrāheṇa rāgam utpādayet /
SA10nagvigvu:358: tad yathā tathāgatena vā tacchrāvakeṇa vā nirmitako nirmitaḥ syāt /
SA10nagvigvu:359: tathāgatādhiṣṭhānena vā tathāgatasrāvakādhiṣṭhānena vā tasya tam asadgrāhaṃ vinivartayet /
SA10nagvigvu:360: evam eva nirmitakopamena śūnyena vacanena nirmitakastrīsadṛśyeṣu niḥsvabhāveṣu yo 'yaṃ svabbāvagrāhaḥ sa nivartyate sa pratiṣidhyate /
SA10nagvigvu:361: tasmād ayam atra dṛṣṭāntaḥ śūnyatāprasādhanaṃ pratyupapadyamāno netaraḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:363: NagVv_28 atha vā sādhyasamo yaṃ hetur na hi vidyate dhvaneḥ sattā /
SA10nagvigvu:365: mā śabdavad iti sādhyasama evāyaṃ hetuḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:371: śabdena hy atra sattā bhaviṣyato vāraṇaṃ tasyeti /
SA10nagvigvu:373: api ca na vayaṃ vyavahārasatyaṃ pratyākhyāya vyavahārasatyam anabhyupagamya kathayāmaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:375: na hi vyavahārasatyam anāgamya śakyā dharmadeśanā kartuṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:378: paramārtham anāgamya nirvāṇaṃ nādhigamyata iti / [= MMK 24.18]
SA10nagvigvu:379: tasmān madvacanavat śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvānāñ ca niḥsvabhāvatvam ubhayathopapadyamānam iti //
SA10nagvigvu:382: pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyo 'py evam iti mataṃ bhavet tad asad eva /
SA10nagvigvu:383: evaṃ tava pratijñā lakṣaṇato dūṣyeta na mameti / [4]
SA10nagvigvu:385: NagVv_29 yadi kācana pratijñā tatra syān na me tat* eṣa me bhaved doṣaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:386: nāsti ca mama pratijñā tasmān naivāsti me doṣaḥ //
SA10nagvigvu:387: yadi ca kācin mama pratijñā syāt tato mama pratijñālakṣaṇaprāptatvāt sa pūrvako doṣaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:388: yathā tvayoktaṃ bhāvāḥ tathā mama syān na ca mama kācid asti pratijñā /
SA10nagvigvu:389: tasmāt sarvahhāveṣu śūnyeṣv atyantopaśānteṣu prakṛtivivikteṣu kutaḥ pratijñālakṣaṇaprāptiḥ kutaḥ pratijñālakṣaṇatāprāptikṛto doṣaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:390: tatra yat bhavatoktaṃ pratijñālakṣaṇaprāptatvāt tavaiva doṣa iti tan nāsti /
SA10nagvigvu:393: pratyakṣeṇa hi tāvad yady upalabhya nivartayasi bhāvān
SA10nagvigvu:398: NagVv_30 yadi kiñcid upalabheyaṃ pravarteyaṃ nivartayeyaṃ vā /
SA10nagvigvu:400: yady ahaṃ kiñcid artham upalabheyaṃ pratyakṣānumānopa + + + + hetubhiḥ pramāṇaiḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:403: ata evaṃ pravartayeyaṃ vārtham evāhaṃ kiñcin nopalabhate tasmān na pravartayāmi na nivartayāmi /
SA10nagvigvu:405: yadi pratyakṣādīnāṃ pramāṇānām anyatamena upalabhya bhāvān vinivartayasīti /
SA10nagvigvu:406: nanu bhavatoktāni pramāṇāni na santi taiś ca pramāṇair api gamyārthā iti sa me bhavaty evānupālambha iti /
SA10nagvigvu:409: NagVv_31 yadi ca pramāṇatas teṣāṃ teṣāṃ prasiddhir arthānām /
SA10nagvigvu:410: teṣāṃ punaḥ prasiddhiṃ brūhi kathaṃ teṣāṃ pramāṇānāṃ //
SA10nagvigvu:412: yadi ca pramāṇatas teṣāṃ teṣām arthānāṃ prameyānāṃ siddhiṃ manyase yathā mānair meyānāṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:413: tathā teṣām idānīṃ pratyakṣānumānopamānāgamānāṃ caturṇāṃ pramāṇānāṃ kutaḥ prasiddhiḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:414: yadi tāvan niḥpramāṇānāṃ pramāṇaṃ syān nādeḥ siddhis tatrāsti naiva madhyasya nāntasya /
SA10nagvigvu:415: yadi punaḥ manyase pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhiḥ pramāṇato 'rthānāṃ prasiddhir iti / hīyate pratijñā /
SA10nagvigvu:418: NagVv_32 anyaiḥ yadi pramāṇaiḥ pramāṇasidhir bhavaty anavasthā syān /
SA10nagvigvu:419: nādeḥ siddhis tatrāsti naiva madhyasya nāntasya //
SA10nagvigvu:421: pramāṇaiḥ prameyāṇāṃ prasiddhis teṣāṃ pramāṇānām anyaiḥ pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhir anavasthāprasaṅgaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:423: nādeḥ siddhis tatrāsti naiva madhyasya nāntasya /
SA10nagvigvu:425: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ teṣam api hi pramāṇānām anyaiḥ pramāṇaiḥ siddhis teṣām anyair iti nāsty ādiḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:426: āder asadbhāvāt kuto madhyaṃ kuto antaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:427: tasmāt teṣāṃ pramāṇānām anyaiḥ pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhiḥ nopapadyateti /
SA10nagvigvu:429: NagVv_33 teṣām atha pramāṇair vinā prasiddhiḥ vihīyate vādaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:431: atha manyase teṣāṃ pramāṇānāṃ vinā pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhiḥ prameyānāṃ punar arthānāṃ pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhir iti /
SA10nagvigvu:432: evaṃ sati yas te vādaḥ pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhir arthānām iti hīyate vaiṣamikatvañ ca bhavati /
SA10nagvigvu:434: arthānāṃ pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhiḥ keṣāñcin neti viśeṣahetuś ca vaktavyaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:435: yena hetunā keṣāṃcid arthānāṃ pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhiḥ keṣāñcin neti /
SA10nagvigvu:436: sā ca nopadiṣṭaḥ tasmād iyam api kalpanā nopapanneti /
SA10nagvigvu:437: atrāha / pramāṇāny eva mama svātmānaṃ parātmānañ ca prasādhayanti / yathoktaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:438: dyotayati svātmānaṃ yathā hutāsaḥ tathā parātmānaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:443: NagVv_34 viṣamopanyāso 'yaṃ na hy ātmānaṃ prakāśayaty agniḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:444: na hi tasyānupalabdhiḥ dṛṣṭā tamasīva kumbhasya //
SA10nagvigvu:446: agnivat pramāṇāni svātmānañ ca prasādhayanti parātmānañ ca prasādhayantīti /
SA10nagvigvu:448: yadi hi yathā prāg evāgninā aprakāśitas tamasi kumbho nopalabhyate /
SA10nagvigvu:449: athottarakālam upalabhyate 'gninā prakāśitaḥ san evam eva yady agninā na prakāśitaḥ prāg agniḥ syād uttarakālam agneḥ prakāśanaṃ syāt /
SA10nagvigvu:454: NagVv_35 yadi ca svātmānam ayaṃ tvadvacanena prakāśayaty agniḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:455: param iva na tv ātmānaṃ paridhakṣyaty api hutāśaḥ //
SA10nagvigvu:456: yadi ca tvadvacanena yathā parātmānaṃ prakāśayaty agniḥ evam eva svātmānam api prakāśayaty agnir iti /
SA10nagvigvu:460: tatra yad uktaṃ parātmānam iva svātmānaṃ prakāśayaty agnir iti tan na //
SA10nagvigvu:462: NagVv_36 yadi ca svaparātmānau tvadvacanena prakāśayaty agniḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:464: yadi ca bhavato bhavato matena svātmāparātmānau prakāśayaty agniḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:467: tatra yad uktaṃ svaparātmānau prakāśayaty agnir iti tan na //
SA10nagvigvu:470: NagVv_37 nāsti tamaś ca jvalane yatra ca tiṣṭhate parātmani jvalanaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:471: kurute kathaṃ prakāśaṃ sa hi prakāśo andhakāravadhaḥ //
SA10nagvigvu:474: prakāśaś ca nāma tamasaḥ pratighātas tatra katham asya tamasaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:480: yasmād evaṃ svaparātmānau na prakāśayaty agniḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:481: tena hy utpadyamānenaivāgninā tamasaḥ pratighataḥ kutaḥ tasmān nāgnau tamo 'sti /
SA10nagvigvu:483: yasmād utpadyamāna evobhayaṃ prakāśayaty agniḥ svātmānaṃ parātmānañ ceti /
SA10nagvigvu:486: NagVv_38 utpadyamāna eva prakāśayaty agnir ity asadvādaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:487: utpadyamāna eva prāpnoti tamo na hi hutāśaḥ //
SA10nagvigvu:488: ayam agnir utpadyamāna eva prakāśayati svātmānaṃ parātmānañ ceti /
SA10nagvigvu:490: kasmān na hy utpadyamāna evāgniḥ tamaḥ prāpnoti /
SA10nagvigvu:493: NagVv_39 aprāpto 'pi jvalano yadi vā punar andhakāram upahanyāt /
SA10nagvigvu:494: sarveṣu lokadhātuṣu tamo 'yam iha saṃsthita upahanyāt //
SA10nagvigvu:495: athāpi manyase aprāpto 'py agnir andhakāram upahantīti /
SA10nagvigvu:496: nanv idānīm iha saṃsthito agniḥ sarvalokadhātustham upahaniṣyati tamaḥ tulyāyām aprāpto na caitad evaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:497: tasmād aprāpyaivāgnir andhakāram upahantīti yad iṣṭaṃ / tan na /
SA10nagvigvu:499: NagVv_40 yadi ca svataḥ pramāṇasiddhir anapekṣya te prameyāṇi /
SA10nagvigvu:500: bhavati pramāṇasiddhiḥ nāparāpekṣā hi siddhir iti //
SA10nagvigvu:501: yadi cāgnivat svataḥ pramāṇasiddhir iti manyase /
SA10nagvigvu:502: anapekṣāpi prameyāṇi pramāṇānāṃ siddhiḥ bhaviṣyatīti kiṃ kāraṇaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:505: atrāha / yadi nāpekṣyante prameyān arthān apramāṇāni ko doṣo bhaviṣyatīti / atrocyate /
SA10nagvigvu:506: NagVv_41 anāpeksā hi prameyān arthān yadi te pramāṇasaṃsiddhiḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:507: bhavati na bhavanti kasyacid evam imāni pramāṇāni //
SA10nagvigvu:508: yadi prameyān arthān anapekṣya siddhir bhavati pramāṇānām iti /
SA10nagvigvu:509: tānīmāni pramāṇāni na kasyacit pramāṇāni bhavanti /
SA10nagvigvu:512: naivedānīm anapekṣya prameyān arthān pramāṇāni bhavanti //
SA10nagvigvu:514: NagVv_42 atha matam apekṣa siddhis teṣām iti atra bhavati ko doṣaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:515: siddhasya na sādhanaṃ syān nāsiddho pekṣate hy anyat //
SA10nagvigvu:516: athāpi matam apekṣya prameyān arthān pramāṇānāṃ siddhir bhavatīti /
SA10nagvigvu:517: evaṃ te sati siddhasya pramāṇacatuṣṭayasya sādhanaṃ bhavatīti /
SA10nagvigvu:520: na hy asiddho devadattaḥ kañcid artham apekṣate na ca siddhasya sādhanam iṣṭaṃ kṛtasya kāraṇam anupapatter iti //
SA10nagvigvu:522: NagVv_43 sidhyanti hi prameyāṇy apekṣya yadi sarvathā pramāṇāni /
SA10nagvigvu:526: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ na hi sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ sādhanaṃ sādhayati /
SA10nagvigvu:531: NagVv_44 yadi ca prameyasiddhir anapekṣaiva bhavati pramāṇāni /
SA10nagvigvu:532: kin te pramāṇasiddhyā tāni yad arthaṃ prasiddhaṃ tata //
SA10nagvigvu:533: yadi ca manyase 'napekṣyaiva pramāṇāni prameyānāṃ prasiddhir bhavati /
SA10nagvigvu:534: kim idānīṃ te pramāṇasiddhyā paryanviṣṭayā kiṃ kāraṇaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:535: yad arthaṃ hi tāni pramāṇāni paryanviṣyeran /
SA10nagvigvu:536: te prameyārthā vinā pramāṇaiḥ siddhāḥ tatra kiṃ pramāṇaiḥ kṛtyaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:537: NagVv_45 atha tu pramāṇasiddhir bhavaty apekṣyaiva te prameyāṇi /
SA10nagvigvu:538: vyatyaya evaṃ sati te dhruvaṃ pramāṇaprameyāṇāṃ //
SA10nagvigvu:539: athāpi manyase 'pekṣyaiva prameyān arthāna pramāṇani bhavanti /
SA10nagvigvu:540: evaṃ te sati mā bhūt pūrvoktadoṣa iti kṛtvā /
SA10nagvigvu:541: evaṃ te sati vyatyayaḥ + + + + + yāṇāṃ bhavati /
SA10nagvigvu:547: NagVv_46 atha te pramāṇasiddhyā prameyasiddhiḥ prameyasiddhyā ca /
SA10nagvigvu:548: bhavati pramāṇasiddhiḥ nāsty ubhayasyāpi te siddhiḥ //
SA10nagvigvu:549: atha manyase pramāṇasiddhyā prameyasiddhir bhavati pramāṇāpekṣatvāt /
SA10nagvigvu:550: prameyasiddhyā ca pramāṇasiddhir bhavati prameyāpekṣatvād iti //
SA10nagvigvu:551: evaṃ saty ubhayasyāpi siddhir na .y. + + + + ṇaṃ
SA10nagvigvu:552: NagVv_47 sidhyanti hi pramāṇair yadi prameyāṇi tāni tair evā /
SA10nagvigvu:553: sādhyāni ca prameyais tāni kathaṃ sādhayiṣyanti //
SA10nagvigvu:554: yadi hi pramāṇaiḥ pramayāṇi sidhyanti tāni pramāṇāni tair eva prameyaiḥ sādhayitavyāni /
SA10nagvigvu:555: nanv asiddheṣu prameyeṣu kāraṇasyāsiddhatvād asiddhāni kathaṃ sādhayisyanti prameyāṇīti /
SA10nagvigvu:557: NagVv_48 sidhyanti ca prameyaiḥ yadi pramāṇāni tāni tair eva /
SA10nagvigvu:558: sādhyāni ca prameyais tāni kathaṃ sādhayiṣyanti //
SA10nagvigvu:559: yadi prameyaiḥ pramāṇāni sidhyanti tāni ca prameyāṇi tair eva pramāṇaiḥ sādhayitavyānīti /
SA10nagvigvu:560: nanv asiddheṣu pramāṇeṣu kāraṇasyāsiddhatvād asiddhāni kathaṃ sādhayiṣyanti pramāṇāni /
SA10nagvigvu:561: NagVv_49 pitra yady utpādyaḥ putro yadi tena caiva putreṇa /
SA10nagvigvu:562: utpādyaḥ sa yadi pitā vada tatrotpādayati kaḥ kaṃ //
SA10nagvigvu:564: pitrā putra utpādanīyaḥ sa ca pitā putreṇotpādanīya iti /
SA10nagvigvu:567: pramāṇaiḥ prameyāni sādhayitavyāni tāny eva ca punaḥ pramāṇāni taiḥ prameyaiḥ tatredānīṃ tu katamaiḥ katamāni sādhayitavyāni /
SA10nagvigvu:569: NagVv_50 kaś ca pitā kaḥ putraḥ tatra tvaṃ brūhi kathaṃ tāv ubhāv api ca /
SA10nagvigvu:571: tayoś ca pūrvopadiṣṭayoḥ pitāputrayoḥ vada kataraḥ putraḥ kataraḥ pitā ubhāv api tāv utpādakatvāt pitṛlakṣaṇadharau /
SA10nagvigvu:572: utpādyatvāc ca putralakṣaṇadharāv atra naḥ sandeho bhavati /
SA10nagvigvu:573: kataras tatra pitā kataras tatra putra iti /
SA10nagvigvu:577: ubhayāny api hy etāni pramāṇāni tāni prameyāṇi sādhyatvāt prameyāṇīti /
SA10nagvigvu:581: NagVv_51 naiva svataḥ prasiddhir na parasparataḥ pramāṇair vā /
SA10nagvigvu:582: bhavati na ca prameyaiḥ na cāpy akasmāt pramāṇānāṃ //
SA10nagvigvu:583: na svataḥ prasiddhiḥ pratyakṣasya tenaiva pratyakṣeṇānumānasya tenaivānumāne /
SA10nagvigvu:586: nāpi parasyāt pratyakṣasyānumānopamānāgamair anumānasya pratyakṣopamānāgamair upamānasya pratyakṣānumānāgamaiḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:588: nāpi pratyakṣānumānopamānāgamād anyaiḥ pratyakṣānumānopamānāgamair yathāsvaṃ nāpi prameyaiḥ samastavyastaiḥ svaviṣayaparaviṣatāgṛhītaiḥ nāpy akasmān nāsti samuccayena /
SA10nagvigvu:589: eteṣāṃ kāraṇānāṃ pūrvoddiṣṭānāṃ viṃśas triṃśac catvāriśat ṣaṭviṃśatir vā tatra yad uktaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:590: pramāṇādhigamyatvāt prameyāṇāṃ bhāvānāṃ santi tu prameyā bhāvās tāni ca pramāṇāni yais tu pramāṇaiḥ prameyā bhāvāḥ santaś ca bhāvāḥ samādhigatā iti tan na //
SA10nagvigvu:594: kuśalaṃ janasvabhāvaṃ manyante śeṣeṣv apy eṣa viniyogaḥ / [7]
SA10nagvigvu:596: NagVv_52 kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmāvasthavido brūvate yat /
SA10nagvigvu:598: kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmāvasthavidaḥ kuśalaṃ janasvabhāvaṃ manyante /
SA10nagvigvu:600: syād ayaṃ sa kuśalaḥ svabhāvaḥ ime te kuśalā dharmā iti /
SA10nagvigvu:601: idaṃ tatkuśalavijñānam ayaṃ kuśalavijñānasvabhāva evaṃ sarveṣāṃ na caitad evaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:602: tasmād yad uktam upadiṣṭaḥ svabhāvo dharmāṇām iti tan na //
SA10nagvigvu:605: NagVv_53 yadi ca pratītya kuśalaḥ svabhāva utpadyate sa kuśalānām /
SA10nagvigvu:606: dharmāṇāṃ parabhāvaḥ svabhāva eva kathaṃ bhavati //
SA10nagvigvu:607: yadi ca kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo hetupratyayasāmagrīṃ pratītyotpadyate /
SA10nagvigvu:608: parabhāvād utpannaḥ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kathaṃ svabhāvo bhavati /
SA10nagvigvu:612: evam akuśalānām akuśalādir iti / tan na //
SA10nagvigvu:614: NagVv_54 atha na pratītya kiñcit svabhāva utpadyate sa kuśalānām /
SA10nagvigvu:615: dharmāṇām evaṃ syād vāso na brahmacaryasya //
SA10nagvigvu:617: na kiñcit pratītya kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kuśalasvabhāva utpadyate /
SA10nagvigvu:618: evam akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām akuśalaḥ avyākṛtānām avyākṛta iti /
SA10nagvigvu:619: evaṃ saty abrahmacaryavāso bhavati kiṃ kāraṇaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:620: pratītyasamutpādasya hi evaṃ sati pratyākhyānaṃ bhavati /
SA10nagvigvu:622: na hy avidyamānasya pratītyasamutpādasya darśanam utpadyamānaṃ bhavati /
SA10nagvigvu:625: bhagavatā yo hi bhikṣavaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati sa dharmaṃ paśyati /
SA10nagvigvu:632: asati hi samudaye tat kuto duḥkhaṃ samudeṣyati /
SA10nagvigvu:634: asati hi duḥkhasamudaye kasya prahāṇān nirodho bhaviṣyati /
SA10nagvigvu:635: asati hi duḥkhanirodhe kasya prāptaye mārgo bhaviṣyati /
SA10nagvigvu:641: NagVv_55 nādharmo dharmo vā satyavyavahārāś ca lokikā ni syuḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:642: nityāś ca sarvabhāvāḥ syuḥ nityatvād ahetumataḥ //
SA10nagvigvu:644: evaṃ sati pratītyasamutpādaṃ pratyācakṣaṇasya bhavataḥ ko doṣa prasajyate /
SA10nagvigvu:645: dharmo na bhavati adharmo na bhavati /
SA10nagvigvu:647: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ hy etat sarvam asati pratītyasamutpāde kuto bhaviṣyati /
SA10nagvigvu:648: api ca sasvabhāvo 'pratītyasamutpanno nirhetuko nityaḥ syāt /
SA10nagvigvu:649: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ nirhetukā hi bhāvā nityās tatra sa eva cābrahmacaryavāsaḥ prasajyet svasiddhāntavirodhaś ca /
SA10nagvigvu:650: kiṃ kāraṇam anityā hi bhagavatā sarve saṃskārā nirdeṣṭās te svabhāvanityatvān nityā hi bhavanti /
SA10nagvigvu:651: NagVv_56 eṣa cākuśaleṣv avyākṛteṣu nairyāṇādiṣu ca doṣas /
SA10nagvigvu:652: tasmāt sarvaṃ saṃskṛtam asaṃskṛtaṃ te bhavaty evaṃ //
SA10nagvigvu:653: yaś caiṣa kuśaleṣu nirdeṣṭaḥ kalpaḥ sa evākuśaleṣu sa evāvyākṛteṣu sa evānairyāṇikaprabhṛtiṣu doṣas tasmāt sarvam idaṃ saṃskṛtam asaṃskṛtaṃ saṃpadyate //
SA10nagvigvu:654: kiṃkāraṇaṃ heto hy asaty utpādasthitibhaṅgā na bhavanti /
SA10nagvigvu:657: tatra yad uktaṃ kuśalādīnāṃ bhāvānāṃ svabhāvasadbhāvād aśūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti tan na //
SA10nagvigvu:660: yadi ca na bhavet svabhāvo bhāvānāṃ na svabhāva ity evaṃ
SA10nagvigvu:661: nāmāpi bhaved evaṃ nāma hi nirvastukaṃ nāsti / [9]
SA10nagvigvu:662: NagVv_57 yaḥ sadbhūtaṃ nāma brūyāt sasvabhāva ity evam /
SA10nagvigvu:663: bhavatā prativaktavyo nāma brūmaś ca na vayaṃ sata //
SA10nagvigvu:664: yo nāma sadbhūtaṃ brūyāt sasvabhāva iti sa bhavatā prativaktavyaḥ syāt /
SA10nagvigvu:667: na hy asadbhūtasya svabhāvasya sadbhūtaṃ nāma bhavatīti /
SA10nagvigvu:668: na punar vayaṃ nāma sadbhūtaṃ brūmas tad api hi svabhāvasyābhāvān nāma niḥsvabhāvatvāt śūnyaṃ śūnyatvād asadbhūtam /
SA10nagvigvu:669: tatra yad bhavatoktaṃ nāmasadbhāvāt sadbhūtaḥ svahhāvā iti / tan na //
SA10nagvigvu:672: NagVv_58 nāmāsad iti ca yad idaṃ tat kiṃ nu sato bhavaty utāsataḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:673: yadi hi sato yady asato dvidhāpi te hīyate vādaḥ //
SA10nagvigvu:674: yac caitan nāmāsad iti tat kiṃ sataḥ asataḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:675: yadi hi satas tan nāma yady asata ubhayathāpi pratijñā hīyate /
SA10nagvigvu:678: na hīdanīṃ tad asad idānīṃ sat* athāsata /
SA10nagvigvu:679: asad iti nāma yā pratijñā asadbhūtasya nāma na bhavati astitvasvabhāva iti nāma tasmāt sadbhūtaḥ svabhāva iti / sā hīnā //
SA10nagvigvu:681: NagVv_59 sarveṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ śūnyatvañ copapāditaṃ pūrvam /
SA10nagvigvu:682: sa upālambhaḥ tasmād bhavaty ayañ cāpratijñāyāḥ //
SA10nagvigvu:683: iha cāsmābhiḥ pūrvam eva sarveṣāṃ bhāvānaṃ vistarataḥ śūnyatvam upapāditam /
SA10nagvigvu:684: tatra prāg nāmano 'pi śūnyatvam uktaṃ saṃbhavā aśūnyatvaṃ parigṛhya pravṛtto vaktuṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:685: yadi bhāvānāṃ svābhāvo na syād asvabhāva iti nāmāpīdan na syād iti /
SA10nagvigvu:687: na hi vayaṃ nāma sadbhūtam iti brūmaḥ //
SA10nagvigvu:690: atha vidyate svabhāvas sa ca dharmāṇāṃ na vidyate sa tasmāt
SA10nagvigvu:691: dharmair vinā svabhāvaḥ sa yasya tad yuktam upadeṣṭuṃ / [10]
SA10nagvigvu:692: NagVv_60 atha vidyate svabhāvaḥ sa ca dharmāṇāṃ na vidyatat iti idam /
SA10nagvigvu:693: āśaṅkitaṃ yad uktaṃ bhavaty anāśaṅkitaṃ tac ca //
SA10nagvigvu:694: na hi vayaṃ dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaṃ pratiṣedhayāmaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:695: dharmavinirmuktasya vā kasyacid arthasya svabhāvam abhyupagacchāmaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:696: nanv evaṃ sati ya upālambho bhavati /
SA10nagvigvu:697: yadi dharmā niḥsvabhāvāḥ kasya khalv idānīm anyasyārthasya dharmavinirmuktasya svabhāvo bhavati /
SA10nagvigvu:702: sata eva pratiṣedho nāsti ghaṭo geha ity ayaṃ yasmāt /
SA10nagvigvu:703: dṛṣṭaḥ pratiṣedho 'yaṃ mataḥ svabhāvasya te tasmāt / [11] ity
SA10nagvigvu:705: NagVv_61 sata eva pratiṣedho yadi śūnyatvaṃ nanv apratisiddham idam /
SA10nagvigvu:713: NagVv_62 pratiṣedhayase atha tvaṃ śūnyatvaṃ tac ca nāsti śūnyatvam /
SA10nagvigvu:714: pratiṣedhaḥ sata iti te nanv eṣa vihīyate vādaḥ //
SA10nagvigvu:716: sarvabhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvatvaṃ śūnyatvaṃ nāsti tac ca śūnyatvam /
SA10nagvigvu:717: yā tarhi te pratijñā sataḥ pratiṣedho bhavati nāsata iti sā hīnā //
SA10nagvigvu:720: NagVv_63 pratiṣedhayāmi nāhaṃ kiñcit pratiṣedhyam asti na ca kiñcit /
SA10nagvigvu:721: tasmāt pratiṣedhayasīty adhilaya eva tvayā kriyate //
SA10nagvigvu:722: evam api tu kṛtvā yady ahaṃ kiñcit pratiṣedhayāmi tato yuktam eva vaktuṃ syāt /
SA10nagvigvu:723: na caivahaṃ kiñcit pratiṣedhayāmi tasmān na kiñcit pratiṣedhavyam asti /
SA10nagvigvu:724: tasmāt śūnyeṣu sarvabhāveṣv avidyamāne pratiṣedhye pratiṣedhayasīty eṣa tvayātra sadbhūto 'dhilayaḥ kriyata iti //
SA10nagvigvu:726: atha nāsti sa svabhāvaḥ kin nu pratiṣidhyate tvayānena
SA10nagvigvu:727: vacanena rte vacanāt pratiṣedhaḥ sidhyate hy asataḥ // [12]
SA10nagvigvu:729: NagVv_64 yac cāhaṃ te vacanād asataḥ pratiṣedhavacanasiddhir iti /
SA10nagvigvu:730: atra jñāpayate vāg asad iti tan na pratinihanti //
SA10nagvigvu:733: sate 'pi vacanād asataḥ pratiṣedhaḥ pratisiddhaḥ tatra kin niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvāḥ iti /
SA10nagvigvu:735: atra brūmaḥ niḥsvabhāvā iti etat khalu vacanaṃ na niḥsvabhāvān sarvabhāvān karoti /
SA10nagvigvu:736: kintv asata svabhāva bhāvānām asata svabhāvānām iti jñāpayati /
SA10nagvigvu:737: tatra kaścit brūyād avidyamāhagṛhe devadattas tam asti gṛhe devadatta iti /
SA10nagvigvu:740: kintu jñāpayati kevalam asadbhāvaṃ gṛhe devadattasyeti //
SA10nagvigvu:741: tadvā nāsti svabhāvo bhāvānām ity etadvacanaṃ na svabhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvatvaṃ karoti /
SA10nagvigvu:743: tatra yad bhavatoktaṃ kim asati svabhāve nāsti svabhāva ity etadvacanaṃ karoti /
SA10nagvigvu:744: ṛte 'pi vacanāt prasiddhiḥ svabhāvasyābhāva iti / tat te na yuktaṃ
SA10nagvigvu:748: evaṃ mithyāgrāhaḥ syāt te prasidhyate hy asataḥ / [13]
SA10nagvigvu:749: yat punar bhavato mṛgātṛṣṇāyām ity atra brūmaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:750: NagVv_65 mṛgatṛṣṇādṛṣṭānte yaḥ punar uktaṃ tvayā mahāṃś carcaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:751: tatrāpi nirṇayaṃ śṛṇu yathā sa dṛṣṭānta upapannaḥ //
SA10nagvigvu:752: ya eva tvayā mṛgatṛṣṇādṛṣṭānte mahāṃś carca uktaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:753: tatrāpi tayā nirṇayaḥ sa śrūyatāṃ upapanna eva dṛṣṭānto bhavati /
SA10nagvigvu:754: NagVv_66 sa yadi svabhāvataḥ syād bhāvo na syāt pratītya samudbhūtaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:755: yaś ca pratītya hhavati grāho nanu śūnyatā saiva //
SA10nagvigvu:756: yadi ca mṛgatṛṣṇāyāṃ sa yathājalagrāhaḥ svabhāvataḥ syāt /
SA10nagvigvu:758_0: yato mṛgatṛṣṇāñ ca pratītya viparītañ ca darśanaṃ pratītya yoniśomanaskārañ ca pratītya
SA10nagvigvu:758_1: prādurbhūto ataḥ pratītyasamutpannaḥ yataś ca pratītyasamutpanno 'taḥ svabhāvataḥ śūnya eva /
SA10nagvigvu:762: NagVv_67 yadi ca svabhāvataḥ syād grāhaḥ kas taṃ vinivartayed grāham /
SA10nagvigvu:763: śeṣeṣv apy eṣa vidhiḥ tasmād eṣo 'nupālambhaḥ //
SA10nagvigvu:764: yadi ca mṛgatṛṣṇāyāṃ jalagrāhaḥ svabhāvataḥ syāt /
SA10nagvigvu:767: tathāgner uṣṇatvam apāṃ dravatvam ākāśasya niravavaraṇatvaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:770: yadā caitad evaṃ śeṣeṣv api dharmeṣv eṣa kramaḥ pratyavagantavyaḥ grāhyapravṛttiṣu pañcasu /
SA10nagvigvu:771: tatra yad bhavato + + + + pād aśūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti tan na //
SA10nagvigvu:774: hetoś ca te na siddhir naiḥsvabbāvyāt kuto hi te hetuḥ
SA10nagvigvu:775: nirhetukasya siddhir na copapannāsya te 'rthasya [l7] iti //
SA10nagvigvu:777: NagVv_68 etena hetvabhāvaḥ pratyuktaḥ pūrvam eva sa samatvāt /
SA10nagvigvu:779: etenaiva cedānīṃ carcena pūrvoktena hetvabhāvo 'pi pratyavagantavyaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:780: ya eva hi carcaḥ pūrvasmin hetāv uktaḥ ṣaṭkapratiṣe + + + + + + hāpi carcayitavyaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:783: pūrvaṃ cet pratiṣedhaḥ paścāt pratiṣedhyam ily anupapannaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:784: paścāc cānupapanno yugapac ca yataḥ svabhāvo 'sana // [20]
SA10nagvigvu:786: NagVv_69 yat traikālye hetuḥ pratyuktaṃ pūrvam eva sa samatvāt /
SA10nagvigvu:788: sa eṣa hetuḥ traikālye pratiṣedhavācī sa tūktottaraḥ pratyavamantaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:790: yathā hi pratiṣedhas traikālye nopapady.e + + + + + + pratiṣedhapratiṣedhe 'pi /
SA10nagvigvu:791: tasmāt pratiṣedhapratiṣedhye 'sati bhavān manyate pratiṣedhaḥ pratisiddha iti tan na /
SA10nagvigvu:792: yataś caiṣa trikālapratiṣedhavācī hetur eṣa eva śūnyatāvādināṃ prāptaḥ sarvabhāvasvabhāvapratiṣedhakatvān na bhavataḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:794: pratiṣedhayāmi nāhaṃ kiñcit pratiṣedhyam asti na ca kiñcit
SA10nagvigvu:795: tasmāt pratiṣedhayasīty adhilaya eṣa tvayā kriyata [63] iti //
SA10nagvigvu:797: atha manyase triṣv api kāleṣu + + + + + + + dṛṣṭaḥ pūrvakālīno 'pi hetuḥ uttarakālīno 'pi /
SA10nagvigvu:801: yathā śiṣyācāryasya yugapatkālīnaḥ yathā pradīpaḥ prakāśasyeti //
SA10nagvigvu:803: na caitad eva yuktā hy etasmiṃ traye pūrvadoṣaḥ //
SA10nagvigvu:804: api ca punaḥ yady evaṃ kamaḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:809: NagVv_70 prabhavati ca śūnyateyaṃ yasya prabhavanti tasya sarvārthāḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:810: prabhavati na tasya kinna prabhavati śūnyatā yasyeti //
SA10nagvigvu:811: yasya śūnyateyaṃ prabhavati tasya sarvārthā laukikalokottarāḥ prabhavanti /
SA10nagvigvu:813: yasya hi śūnyatā prabhavati tasya pratītyasamutpādaḥ prabhavati /
SA10nagvigvu:814: yasya pratītyasamutpādaḥ prabhavati tasya catvāry āryasatyāni prabhavanti /
SA10nagvigvu:819: yasya pratītyasamutpādaḥ prabhavanti tasya dharmo dharmahetur dharmaphalañ ca prabhavanti /
SA10nagvigvu:821: tasya kleśaḥ kleśasamudayaḥ kleśavastūni ca prabhavanti /
SA10nagvigvu:822: yasyaitat sarvaṃ bhavati pūrvoktaṃ tasya sugatiṃ durgatiṃ vyavasthā + + + + + + + gatidurgatigamanaṃ /
SA10nagvigvu:824: sugatidurgatigamanavyatikramaṇaṃ sugatidurgativyatikramopāyaḥ sarvasaṃvyavahārāś ca lokikāḥ svayam adhigantavyāḥ /
SA10nagvigvu:825: anayā diśā kiñcit śakyaṃ vacanopadeṣṭam iti /
SA10nagvigvu:829: anekārthāṃ nijagāda praṇamāmi tam apratimaṃ tu buddhim iti //
SA10nagvigvu:831: // likhitam idaṃ śrīdhramakirtinā sarvasatvahetoḥ yathālabdham iti //
